channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Even Google and Replit struggle to deploy AI agents reliably — here's why
item.description: 2025 was supposed to be the year of the AI agent, right? Not quite, acknowledge Google Cloud and Replit — two big players in the AI agent space and partners in the "vibe coding" movement — at a recent VB Impact Series event.Even as they build out agentic tools themselves, leaders from the two companies say the capabilities aren’t quite there yet. This constrained reality comes down to struggles with legacy workflows, fragmented data, and immature governance models. Also, enterprises fundamentally misunderstand that agents aren’t like other technologies: They require a fundamental rethink and r...

item.title: « On s’est fait avoir » : comment iRobot a perdu la guerre des aspirateurs robots et pourquoi la Chine est son seul salut
item.description: C'est rare. Très rare. Un CEO qui vous regarde dans les yeux et vous dit : "On s'est plantés." C'est pourtant ce que vient de faire Gary Cohen. Alors qu'iRobot passe sous pavillon chinois pour éviter la faillite, le patron de la marque emblématique ne cherche pas d'excuses. Retards technologiques, arrogance, prix déconnectés... iRobot nous explique tout. ...

item.title: A Suction-Based Wall Mount Is Here to Clean Up Your Hideous TV Cord Spaghetti
item.description: Displace is back with a hub that makes your regular TV "cordless."

item.title: Netflix is betting on podcasts to become the new daytime talk show
item.description: Netflix is making exclusive deals with podcast studios to compete with YouTube, but podcasters have mixed feelings.

item.title: Netflix is acquiring an avatar company as it moves into party games
item.description: As Netflix continues to build out its gaming strategy, which has recently included a new era of TV party games, it's going to let people build avatars - with the help of a new acquisition. The company is acquiring avatar company Ready Player Me and its "cross-game avatar tech" to let players "carry their identities […]

item.title: Don’t expect Trump Media’s nuclear fusion power plant to generate electricity soon
item.description: Trump Media - yup, the parent company of Truth Social - is the latest entrant in the near century-long race to develop a nuclear fusion power plant. It announced a merger agreement with fusion company TAE Technologies on Thursday, and a bold plan to break ground on the first utility-scale fusion plant some time in […]

item.title: ‘Avatar: Fire and Ash’s’ New Power Couple Discuss Their Trippy Seduction
item.description: Oona Chaplin and Stephen Lang talked to io9 about Varang and Quaritch's intimate scene, in theaters now.

item.title: The best Christmas gifts for gamers and movie lovers
item.description: Most of us in the Northern Hemisphere spend the holidays indoors, but you can only watch so many TikToks about cute cats and cooking hacks before the need for something a little more substantive kicks in. Choosing the right game or movie to gift is tough, though, especially if you don't have an exact read […]

item.title: #FrandroidOffreMoi une trottinette UrbanGlide 100 EVO
item.description: On a réussi à cacher une trottinette électrique dans la 19e case de notre calendrier de l'Avent. Voici comment gagner l'UrbanGlide 100 EVO avec le concours #FrandroidOffreMoi.

item.title: Apple's USB-C Magic Mouse is back on sale for $68
item.description:
Amazon is selling Apple's USB-C Magic Mouse for $68, which is a discount of 14 percent. This isn't a record-low price, but it's darned close. The mouse typically sells for $79, though today's sale only applies to the white model. It's rare for official Apple accessories to go on sale, and the USB-C Magic Mouse is pretty much a must-have for those working on desktop computers. It's also fairly handy when combined with a laptop, letting folks avoid the trackpad.
As the name suggests, this mouse charges via USB-C. Apple stuck with replaceable AA batteries for way too long, so this change was m...

item.description: We've fully retested our recommended VPNs and the results are in...

item.title: OpenAI adds new teen safety rules to ChatGPT as lawmakers weigh AI standards for minors
item.description: OpenAI updated its guidelines for how its AI models should behave with users under 18, and published new AI literacy resources for teens and parents. Still, questions remain about how well policies translate into practice.

item.title: Scientists Shocked to Discover Microbes ‘Colonizing’ Lava Within Hours of Solidifying
item.description: Not even the strongest microbes can survive volcanic eruptions, but they are capable of returning surprisingly quickly, according to a new study.

item.title: J’ai pris en main le Samsung Galaxy Z TriFold : trois fois plus de plaisir et trois fois plus de questions
item.description: J'ai eu l'occasion de prendre en main le Samsung Galaxy Z TriFold. Voici mes premiers ressentis sur le smartphone tri-pliable, les bons comme les moins bons.

item.title: Ce pack Asus Vivobook 14 sous Snapdragon X accompagné d’un sac et d’une souris sans fil est à un super prix chez Fnac et Darty
item.description: Si vous préférez tout avoir d’un coup, il existe des packs prêts à l’emploi avec l’essentiel pour démarrer sans friction. C’est le cas de ce bundle autour du PC portable Asus Vivobook 14 sous ARM, accompagné d’un sac et d’une souris sans fil. L’ensemble est affiché à 649,99 euros au lieu de 699,99 euros chez Darty et à la Fnac, avec l'aide d'un code qui se termine le 21 décembre 2025. ...

item.title: Make any TV wireless and battery powered with this add-on that also means you can wall-mount anywhere instantly without drilling
item.description: The Displace Hub enables you to wall-mount your TV without drilling, and even to move it –and it's got a PC inside it

item.description: Generate dedicated URLs for payment with Pay Links.

item.title: Hackers stole data in UK government cyberattack, minister confirms
item.description: The attack seems to have happened in October but the risk towards citizens is minimal.

item.title: Known uses voice AI to help you go on more in-person dates
item.description: In its test phase in San Francisco, Known said it observed 80% of its introductions led to physical dates, which is much higher than swipe-based dating apps.

item.title: The Best Bluetooth Speaker Is $50 Off Right in Time for Christmas
item.description: The JBL Flip 7 is our top tried-and-tested Bluetooth speaker, and we haven't seen it sell for less than it is right now.

item.title: The best Sonos speakers to buy in 2025
item.description: After the self-induced tumult Sonos has gone through this year, I can understand why some people are reluctant to spend money on the company’s products. But newly appointed CEO Tom Conrad has shown that he’s determined to get back on track and revitalize Sonos as the leading whole-home audio brand. The contentious mobile app is […]

item.title: How to use AirPods as a video mic in iOS 26
item.description: In iOS 26, your AirPods can double as a video microphone. Here’s how to enable the feature.

item.title: Inside the marketing playbook that made ‘Stranger Things’ impossible to escape
item.description: A rewatch campaign, cast throwbacks, and behind-the-scenes content helped Netflix reengage fans months before the final season premiered. It’s been nearly a decade since Netflix introduced fans to the fictional town of Hawkins, Ind., the Upside Down, Demogorgons, and the Stranger Things universe.

item.title: Set up a home streaming center with 57% off the Roku 4K HDR Streambar SE and Wireless Bass Bundle
item.description: As of Dec. 19, get 57% off the Roku 4K HDR Streambar SE and Wireless Bass Bundle.

item.title: iRobot racheté : votre Roomba va-t-il arrêter de fonctionner ? Vos données seront-elles stockées en Chine ? La réponse officielle
item.description: iRobot, le pionnier américain, passe sous le contrôle du chinois Picea. Immédiatement, la question se pose : votre Roomba va-t-il cesser de fonctionner ? On a interrogé Gary Cohen, le CEO d'iRobot.

item.title: The Best Movie Moments of 2025
item.description: From 'Sinners' and 'Superman' to 'Weapons' and 'Wicked: For Good,' here are our picks for the best movie moments of 2025.

item.title: The RAM shortage is here to stay, raising prices on PCs and phones
item.description: Your next smartphone or PC might cost more amid a global memory shortage that the International Data Corporation expects to "persist well into 2027." A new report from the research firm lays out the potential impact of the RAM crunch, saying it "signals the end of an era of cheap, abundant memory and storage" - […]

item.title: Checkr review
item.description: In this Checkr review, you'll learn more about the fast, flexible, and tech-driven background screening solution.

item.title: The 16-inch HP OmniBook 5 is $500 off at Walmart
item.description: Score the HP OmniBook 5 with AMD Ryzen AI for just $439 (save $500) at Walmart. Features a 16-inch 2K display and 16GB RAM.

item.title: Steam lance ses promotions de Noël : notre sélection des 28 meilleures offres PC
item.description: Après le Black Friday, la plateforme Steam refait le plein de promotions sur de nombreux jeux vidéo pour les fêtes de fin d'année ! Ces offres sont évidemment plus intéressantes que d'habitude, que ce soit sur le montant de la réduction ou les jeux concernés ! Voici la liste qui mérite le coup d'œil.

item.title: Moon Race Heats Up as New NASA Chief Pits One Billionaire Against Another
item.description: Whichever company can produce a viable crew lander first will win the Artemis 3 contract, NASA’s new chief says.

item.title: Bose’s first-gen QC Ultra headphones just hit their lowest price to date
item.description: If you value peace and quiet, particularly when traveling, Bose’s first-gen QuietComfort Ultra Headphones are worth checking out. They’re our favorite noise-canceling headphones for travel, and right now, you can snag a pair for an all-time low of $279 ($150 off) in select colors from Amazon, Best Buy, and Bose. All three retailers estimate that […]...

item.title: Netflix acquires gaming avatar maker Ready Player Me
item.description: The gaming startup will allow Netflix subscribers to create avatars that can extend across gaming titles.

item.title: The Competitor is a no-nonsense symmetrical Xbox controller that barely puts a foot wrong
item.description: The Competitor might not be stacked to the gills with features, but there’s much to love in its straightforward, no-nonsense approach.

item.title: Voici quel est le meilleur aspirateur robot de l’année – Frandroid Awards 2025
item.description: Le meilleur aspirateur robot selon Frandroid est le DJI Romo P. Découvrez pour ce modèle a reçu le Frandroid Awards de sa catégorie.

item.title: ExpressVPN holiday deal: the top VPN for Windows just got significantly more affordable
item.description: ExpressVPN has dropped its prices just in time for the holidays, with savings of up to $40 on offer.

item.title: AI is likely to replace jobs, Bank of England governor warns
item.description: Bank of England Governor warns that AI could replace some entry-level jobs, making it hard for younger workers to find jobs.

item.title: Après la RAM, ce composant vital de votre PC est le prochain sur la liste des pénuries
item.description: Nvidia est à l'avant-garde d'une nouvelle génération de SSD dédiée à l'IA. Un projet qui pourrait bien provoquer une pénurie de stockage similaire à celle de la RAM, et ce dès 2027.

item.title: This LG 65-inch OLED TV just dropped to its lowest price ever — and it arrives before Christmas
item.description: As of Dec. 19, get the LG 65-inch B5 Series AI OLED 4K TV at Amazon for $896.99. That saves you $100, and is the TV's lowest price ever. Shop now and get it before Christmas.

item.title: Colorado River states deadlocked on water deal as deadline gets pushed back
item.description: Existing water conservation agreements that determine who must use less of the river in times of shortage expire in 2026 and states haven’t reached a deal. The seven states that rely on the Colorado River to supply farms and cities across the U.S. West appear no closer to reaching a consensus on a long-term plan for sharing the dwindling resource.

item.title: Une « grosse claque » : le patron européen du design Stellantis nous explique comment l’IA leur permet de gagner du temps et de l’argent
item.description: Après une brève excursion chez Renault, Gilles Vidal revient chez Stellantis pour chapeauter le design des marques européennes du groupe. Nous l'avons rencontré pour discuter du futur du design automobile à l'ère de la voiture électrique, de l'intelligence artificielle et des innombrables marques chinoises.

item.title: Cette récente montre connectée avec plus de 10 jours d’autonomie est déjà à prix cassé
item.description: Loin derrière les prix des Garmin, Polar et autres montres sportives premium, l'Amazfit Balance 2 nous a bluffés lors de notre prise en main. chez Decathlon, elle entame même ses premières baisses de prix et passe à 239 euros au lieu de 299 euros.
